official_title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to extend the authorization of the Northern Border Regional Commission, and for other purposes.
short_title: Northern Border Regional Commission Reauthorization Act of 2011

summary.text: Northern Border Regional Commission Reauthorization Act of 2011 - Authorizes appropriations for the Northern Border Regional Commission for FY2013-FY2017.
